sparklers.name: Swass Sparklers
sparklers.description: Multi-colored sparklers that are safe for any age.

whipper-snappers.name: Whipper Snappers
whipper-snappers.description: Toss em, throw em, stomp em. Maybe don't eat them.

black-snakes.name: Black Ash Snakes
black-snakes.description: Possibly the most boring firecracker of all time. LIght em, and they grow. Snore.

black-cats.name: Black Cats
black-cats.description: Little sticks of fun that might make your fingers numb if you hold on too long.

bottle-rockets.name: Moon Tarvelers
bottle-rockets.description: A mini explosive rocket. Best to avoid standing over.

roman-candles.name: Roman Candles
roman-candles.description: Sticks of fun that shoot flaming and popping balls. Defiantely don't hold them. jk.. they're way more fun to hold.

basic-morters.name: Mortar and Mortar Shells
basic-morters.description: Large arial fireworks. Various styles and colors

giant-fountain.name: Fire Sploosher
giant-fountain.description: A thiry foot fountain of flame straight from the depths of hell.

sonic-boomer.name: Sonic Boom Mortar
sonic-boomer.description: The loudest mortar shell we make. It'll make your dog crawl under the bed, and your Nana piss her pants.

gun-powder.name: Gun Powder
gun-powder.description: Explosive powder used for various fun things.

detonation-fuse.name: Detonation Fuse
detonation-fuse.description: A long fuse for detonating your choice of explosive.

detonation-caps.name: Detonation Caps
detonation-caps.description: These are the guys that start the show. nest one into your explosive, connect a fuse and blow some things up.

c4.name: C4 Plastic Explosive
c4.description: This is the real deal. Use with cation. Great at blowing up cars and doors.

dynomite.name: Dynomite
dynomite.description: It's old school, but it still goes boom.

moab.name: MOAB
moab.description: The Mother of All Bombs. Trump knows all about it. Actually, probably not.

hydrogen-bomb.name: Hydrogen Bomb
hydrogen-bomb.description: A-bomb, nuke, hydrogen bomb. It goes by many names. It'll do some damage.

cluster-bomb.name: Cluster Bomb
cluster-bomb.description: For when you're not exactily sure what you want to bomb, just bomb everything.
